Package com.nexus

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateController
    This class has the posts and gets for creating a new user.
    CreateService
    This class is the service methods for CreateController.
    DeleteController
    This class has the posts and gets for deactivating and reactivating a user's account.
    DeleteService
    This class has the methods to support the DeleteController.
    FriendsController
    Contains the API methods for friend operations.
    FriendsService
    This class contains the methods to support the FriendsController
    JforumDB  
    JsonUtility
    This class is a transformer for the gson to json conversions.
    LoginController
    This class has the posts and gets for logging in a user and creating their session.
    LoginService
    This class has the methods to support the LoginController.
    Main
    This is the Main method for the middle-tier using the Java Spark Frameworks.
    MessageController
    This class contains the RESTful API methods for messaging.
    MessageService
    This class has the methods which support MessageController.
    NexusDB
    This class contains the database methods.
    Profile
    This object is used to encapsulate the queries results from the database.
    ProfileController
    This class has the posts and gets for loading and editing the profile page of a valid user.
    ProfileService
    This class has all the methods to support the ProfileController.
    User
    This is an Object to help encapsulate the user's data for the LoginService, CreateService, and DeleteService classes.
